body_html:
I think changing API is not an ideal solution to this. But this is an usability issue.

I would suggest we could change the behavior of the logging. For steps >= XXX, we only log evey 1/10th of the progress.

ispirmustafa@, wdyt?

body:
I think changing API is not an ideal solution to this. But this is an usability issue.

I would suggest we could change the behavior of the logging. For steps >= XXX, we only log evey 1/10th of the progress. 

ispirmustafa@, wdyt?
